p: Each lot was released if the following specifications were met: cellularity 1–12 × 10 6 CD133 + cells; purity (% of CD133 + cells/CD45 + cells) ≥ 80%; vitality ≥ 80%; endotoxin < 0.5 EU/ml; and sterile. Cells were stored overnight, resuspended in 10 ml of physiological saline, aliquoted in a sterile polypropylene conical tube and packed by the manufacturer as a "ready-to-use” cell product. Based on our stability data [ 17], cell suspensions were administered within 24 h from the lot release.
